戯つく: (じゃらつく) - to jingle/to jangle/to clink/to chink; to act lasciviously/to act coquettishly
戯らす: (じゃらす) - to play with; to toy with; to tease
戯る: (たわむる) - to be playful; to gambol; to be amused (with something); to play; to sport; to frolic; to joke
戯れ: (tawamure) - brincadeira, esporte, diversão, capricho, piada, gracejo, flerte
戯れつく: (じゃれつく) - to be playful (of a child or animal); to play; to sport; to frolic
戯れる: (じゃれる) - to be playful/to gambol/to be amused (with something)/to play/to sport/to frolic/to joke; to flirt with
戯れ付く: (じゃれつく) - to be playful (of a child or animal); to play; to sport; to frolic
戯れ合う: (じゃれあう) - to frolic about; to mess around
戯れ歌: (ざれうた) - funny song; comic song; limerick
戯れ言: (たわぶれごと) - prank; practical joke
戯作: (ぎさく) - cheap literature/writing for amusement; light literature popular in the late Edo period
戯作三昧: (げさくざんまい) - (yoji) being absorbed in writing popular novels (cheap fiction); being absorbed in writing something to amuse oneself
戯作者: (げさくしゃ) - fiction writer; dime novelist
戯弄: (ぎろう) - teasing; toying with somebody's emotions
戯書き: (ざれがき) - something written for fun; calligraphy written for entertainment
戯歌: (ざれうた) - funny song; comic song; limerick
戯称: (ぎしょう) - jocular name; jocular term; humoristic nickname
戯評: (ぎひょう) - humorous comments; humourous comments; sarcastic remarks; cartoon; caricature; satire
戯談: (げだん) - (じょうだん is sometimes written 笑談)  jest; joke; funny story
戲ける: (たわける) - to jest; to joke; to play the fool; to act indecently; to be silly over; to talk foolishly
戲言: (たわこと) - nonsense; bullshit; silly things; joke
戴き: (いただき) - (esp. 頂) crown (of head)/summit (of mountain)/spire; (頂き,戴き) easy win for one; (頂き,戴き) something received
戴きます: (いただきます) - expression of gratitude before meals
戴く: (いただく) - to receive/to get/to accept/to take/to buy; to eat/to drink; (orig. meaning) to be crowned with/to wear (on one's head)/to have (on top); to have (as one's leader)/to live under (a ruler)/to install (a president)
戴ける: (いただける) - to be able to receive/to be able to take/to be able to accept; to be able to eat/to be able to drink; to be acceptable/to be satisfactory
戴冠式: (たいかんしき) - coronation ceremony; enthronement
戴勝: (やつがしら) - hoopoe (species of Eurasian bird, Upupa epops)
戴白: (たいはく) - old people; becoming gray haired (grey)
戸: (ko/para) - porta, porta (especialmente no estilo japonês); obturador, obturador da janela
戸まら: (とまら) - extensions on the top & bottom of a door that fit into cavities in the frame (as part of a pivot hinge)
戸を破る: (とをやぶる) - to bust down a door; to break a door open
戸を立てる: (とをたてる) - to shut a door
戸を開ける: (とをあける) - to open the door
戸主権: (こしゅけん) - rights accruing to the head of a household (according to laws now obsolete)
戸別訪問: (こべつほうもん) - door-to-door visit; door-to-door canvassing; door-to-door canvasing
戸口調査: (ここうちょうさ) - national census; door-to-door census
戸外撮影: (こがいさつえい) - taking pictures outdoors
戸惑い: (tomadoi) - estar no mar, perder a orientação, confusão, surpresa
戸惑う: (とまどう) - to be bewildered; to be perplexed
戸板: (といた) - sliding door (esp. when removed from its frame and used for carrying things or people); large flounder
戸板返し: (といたがえし) - stage prop in kabuki, consisting of a revolving panel with a life-size doll on each side; rapid change in a situation, person's attitude, etc.
戸棚: (とだな) - cupboard; locker; closet; wardrobe; cabinet
戸棚風呂: (とだなぶろ) - type of public bath from the Edo period
戸毎目張: (トゴットメバル) - Sebastes joyneri (genus of fish); rockfish
戸毎眼張: (トゴットメバル) - Sebastes joyneri (genus of fish); rockfish
戸毎鮴: (トゴットメバル) - Sebastes joyneri (genus of fish); rockfish
戸立蜘蛛: (トタテグモ) - trapdoor spider (any spider of family Ctenizidae); folding trapdoor spider (any spider of family Antrodiaetidae)
戸籍係: (こせきがかり) - family registration official
戸籍抄本: (こせきしょうほん) - official copy of part of family register
戸籍簿: (こせきぼ) - family registry (of the district); original of one's family register; archive of family registers
戸籍調べ: (こせきしらべ) - census-taking; examining family registers
戸籍謄本: (こせきとうほん) - official copy of the family register
戸締まり: (とじまり) - closing up; fastening the doors
戸締り: (とじまり) - closing up; fastening the doors
戸袋: (とぶくろ) - box (built-in) for containing shutters
戸走り: (とばしり) - runner (of a sliding door); tree wax/insect wax/Chinese wax
戸車: (とぐるま) - sash roller; door roller; roller for a sliding door
戸閉蜘蛛: (トタテグモ) - trapdoor spider (any spider of family Ctenizidae); folding trapdoor spider (any spider of family Antrodiaetidae)
戸障子: (としょうじ) - doors and shoji (sliding doors with paper panes)
戻し交配: (もどしこうはい) - backcrossing (crossing a hybrid with one of its parents); backcross
戻す: (もどす) - to put back/to return/to give back/to restore (to a previous state, e.g. defrosting, reconstituting, reconciling)/to turn back (e.g. clock hand); to vomit/to throw up; to recover (of a market price)
戻ってくる: (もどってくる) - to come back
戻って来る: (もどってくる) - to come back
戻って行く: (もどっていく) - to go back
戻り: (modori) - return, reaction, recovery; return (de um procedimento)
